name: Stichting Rewilding Europe
goal:
Rewilding Europe wants to make Europe a wilder place, with much more space for wildlife, wilderness and natural processes. Bringing back the variety of life for us all to enjoy and exploring new ways for people to earn a fair living from the wild.
More information: https://www.rewildingeurope.com/about/mission/
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Development, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Birds and Habitat Directives; Natura 2000; CBD-Aichi Target 2; LIFE programmes; Horizon 2020; Climate change; EIB NCFF
